TopicTitle: Command from space center : which mod is it ?

Articles.Content:
Hello,

I've seen few months ago a mod with which you can pilot probe from the space center. Like being at Houston...

Do you know the name of this mod. Unfortunately, I forgot it :/

Thanks for your help.

PS: i'd like to try it with remotech, Kos and cam.

EDIT: FOUND!!

Looking here and there for others mods, i found it: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/67450-WIP-IVA-PLUGIN-ProbeControlRoom-1-0-beta8a-IVA-All-the-things!-new-3D-RPM-17

Edited January 5, 2015 by brienne
